solution_line_template: Single layer cake slices cost ${cost_single_slice} x {num_single_slices} = $<<{cost_single_slice}*{num_single_slices}={cost_single_slices}>>{cost_single_slices}.
Double layer cake slices cost ${cost_double_slice} x {num_double_slices} = $<<{cost_double_slice}*{num_double_slices}={cost_double_slices}>>{cost_double_slices}.
All the cake slices together cost ${cost_single_slices} + ${cost_double_slices} = $<<{cost_single_slices}+{cost_double_slices}={total_cost_cakes}>>{total_cost_cakes}.
